page.title: 15B.M.X.Bicycles
page.content: In Rothbury there is a craze for B.M.X. bikes. B.M.X. stands for 'Bicycle Motor Cross.' The bicycles we use are specially made to perform different tricks. Sometimes you can see people from our school doing "Wheelies" and "Bunny Hops" which are dangerous stunts to perform. One involves balancing on one wheel and the other means jumping into mid air. I live in Netherton which is seven miles from Rothbury and my friend and I look for places to ride our bikes. Once we were able to perform over the mounds made when foundations were started for a new house but we could not do that for long. B.M.X. is a craze that will not die out quickly. If you are sensible you wear protective gear. There should be a special track built for us in Rothbury.
